mapper.select: SELECT C.ID,C.KEYWORD,M.COUPLE_ID,C.FILEPATH FROM CLIP C JOIN MEETING M ON C.MEETING_ID=M.ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(C.CREATED_AT,"%Y-%m")=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),"%Y-%m") AND IS_SELECTED IS TRUE AND FILEPATH IS NOT NULL AND (C.KEYWORD,M.COUPLE_ID) IN (select C.KEYWORD,M.COUPLE_ID from CLIP C JOIN MEETING M ON C.MEETING_ID=M.ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(C.CREATED_AT,"%Y-%m")=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),"%Y-%m") AND IS_SELECTED IS TRUE AND FILEPATH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY C.KEYWORD,M.COUPLE_ID HAVING COUNT(C.ID)>=5) ORDER BY M.COUPLE_ID,C.KEYWORD,C.CREATED_AT;
